name: Junior      (aka Arpita)
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: Happy 18th birthday (hnn now you are balik) keep the shayar alive inside you :)...keep shining Galactica
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! yrr mujhe pta h bhot boring h ye...
